name: qBittorrent
short_description: Feature-rich BitTorrent client with integrated search engine and web interface.
description: Feature-rich BitTorrent client with integrated search engine and web interface. qBittorrent is a self-hosted application focused on download, network, torrent, p2p. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host qBittorrent on your home server to feature-rich bittorrent client with integrated search engine and web interface without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use qBittorrent to manage your download workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
